# ZIMA Solutions Limited

> Payment gateway Tanzania, fintech, and digital transformation for banks, government, and enterprises. Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.

## About

ZIMA Solutions Limited is a technology and business innovation company in Tanzania. We provide payment gateway solutions (including government electronic payment gateway / GePG), RTGS and TIPS integration with Bank of Tanzania, API gateways, AI agents (WhatsApp, web chat, API), and enterprise software for banks, MFIs, SACCOS, and government agencies.

## Services (what we do for clients)

- RTGS integration (Bank of Tanzania)
- TIPS integration (Tanzania Instant Payment System)
- GePG – government electronic payment gateway integration
- API Gateway
- Loan management
- NIDA integration (Zima NIDA Gate – KYC, national ID verification)
- Mobile Push Service (payments via M-Pesa, Airtel Money, Tigo Pesa)
- SMS Service (bulk SMS, lowest cost in Tanzania)
- Membership Referral System for SACCOS (web and app)
